title: 7 reasons you must visit Telangana's secret gem, Warangal - | Photo1 | India Today Travel|
text:
7 reasons you must visit Telangana's secret gem, Warangal 7 reasons you must visit Telangana's secret gem, Warangal x
From World Heritage sites to lush green landscape with rich biodiversity, Warangal offers every possible opportunity to titillate your wanderlust. Here's why this second biggest city in Telangana deserves to be visited at least once. The ancient capital of the Kakatiya dynasty, Warangal is replete with historical grandeur. The city has now been chosen for HRIDAY (Heritage City Development and Augmentation Yojana) scheme by the Government of India. Besides, the Department of Tourism recently announced its plans of developing an eco-tourism circuit around the city. This tourist destination can be reached from Rajiv Gandhi International Airport, Hyderabad. The city can also be accessed by road or rail from major cities of India. Facebook/Srnivas Panthagani
